name: NSXPCInterface
desc: An interface that may be sent to an exported object or remote object proxy.

items.name: init(with: Protocol)
items.desc: Returns an NSXPCInterface instance for a given protocol.

items.name: var `protocol`: Protocol
items.desc: The Objective-C protocol that this interface is based on.

items.name: func classes(for: Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool) -> Set<AnyHashable>
items.desc: Returns the current list of allowed classes that can appear within the specified collection object argument to the specified method.

items.name: func forSelector(Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool) -> NSXPCInterface?
items.desc: Returns the interface previously set for the specified selector and parameter.

items.name: func setClasses(Set<AnyHashable>, for: Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the classes that can appear within the (numerically) specified collection object argument to the specified method.

items.name: func setInterface(NSXPCInterface, for: Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool)
items.desc: Configures a specific parameter of a method to be sent as a proxy object instead of copied.

items.name: func setXPCType(xpc_type_t, for: Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool)
func xpcType(for: Selector, argumentIndex: Int, ofReply: Bool) -> xpc_type_t?
